name: Login
story: You are in Login and its good for now!
nav: Press 1 to go to Calicut or 2 to wake up

name: Calicut
story: You are in your room in India. Lets go!
nav: Press 1 to go to the airport in Kochi

name: Kochi
story: You are at the Airport. Take a flight
nav: Press 1 to take a flight

name: Flight
story: You took a ticket that is taking you somewhere. Hopefully Canada
nav: Press 1,2 or 3 and lets see where you go

name: N.Korea
story: Oh no! You reached North Korea. You will die if you are not careful
nav: Press 1 to walk to S.Korea or you die

name: Walk S.Korea
story: Walk Slowly see if you can take a flight from the military base
nav: Press 1 to take a flight

name: Pearson
story: Wow you reached Canada! Welcome! Walk out and go to your uncles house first
nav: Press 1 to go to Toronto City

name: Toronto
story: You are looking at one of the most beautiful cities ever. But alas no time to spare. You need to sleep. Go take a Go Bus.
nav: Press 1 to take a Go bus to uncles house

name: GoBus
story: Tell the driver to start the bus and take you to your uncles. See your family have some fun time.
nav: Press 1 to travel

name: BrittaniaAve
story: You are at your uncles. The fatty mickey cat is even more fat now. wow. Have a nice lunch before you take your bus to Sudbury
nav: Press 1 to go to Ontario Northland space terminal

name: OntarioNorthland
story: You are at the Ontario Northland Space Terminal. This will be seen everywhere and will hopefully help you reach sudbury and your room.
nav: Press 1 or 2 and lets see where you go

name: Windsor
story: Oh no! you took the wrong bus! Now you are in windsor. A junkie in the road said there is a bus terminal near the border. Go there if you wanna check it or if you know where you are take the bus
nav: Press 1 to walk to the border to find bus or 2 if you saw one

name: USA Border
story: You are at the USA Border. Be careful with the NERF gun you have in your bag. Border Patrol can shoot you if they feel doubtful.
nav: Press 1 to go to Ontario Northland space terminal

name: Sudbury kingsst
story: WOW! Finally in Sudbury. But ALAS! you lost your keys somewhere. Now you gotta see kevin at work to fetch the keys.
nav: Press 1 to go to the transit terminal

name: Transit
story: You are at the Transit. Be careful which bus you take.
nav: Press 1 to take the 101 bus or 2 for 3 Bus

name: 101 Bus
story: You took the right bus. Get down at Douglas to go to Country Style
nav: Press 1 to get down at Country Style coffee

name: Country Style
story: Youve Reached Country style, bought a Sunriser to finish your hunger and now find kevins office
nav: Press 1 to see Kevin at his office

name: Kevins office
story: Kevin is mad at you for being irresponible. You get the keys anyways and now you are going to take a bus to the residence.
nav: Press 1 for 3 bus or 2 for 2 Bus or 3 to go to the transit terminal

name: 3 Bus
story: Oh no You took the wrong bus! This goes to Laurentian University. There are only few buses from there back. Dont die!
nav: Press 1 to go to the transit terminal or 2 to see where it goes

name: Laurentian Univ
story: Lets try taking a bus before university students attack you out of sleep deprevation
nav: Press 1 for taking the bus again hopefully get to terminal

name: 2 Bus
story: YAAY You took the right bus. Get down at Lamothe to walk to residence.
nav: Press 1 or 2 to get down at residence

name: Residence
story: Finally you reached the lobby. Be careful navigating to your room. Bridget is mad at you for taking her shoes to India.She might kill you if you see her.
nav: Press 1 or 2 to get to  room which will be yours

name: Bridgets room
story: Oh no! You opened Bridgets room! She mad! Now you die sorry!

name: A313
story: FInally you reached your room in the residence. Take a long Nap. You WIN!
